executiveBoard.name: Christopher DeMarkus
responsibilities: Preside over all council meetings and executive board meetings
Serve as official representative of the council
Appoint committee chairs with executive board approval
Ensure compliance with bylaws and national constitution
Maintain communication with national NPHC office
Execute all official documents and contracts
Call special meetings when necessary
Prepare annual report to member organizations
Maintain custody of council seal

executiveBoard.name: Kimberly Conway
responsibilities: Assume presidential duties in president's absence
Chair the Program Committee
Coordinate all council-sponsored events
Maintain event calendar and planning timeline
Supervise event logistics and vendor coordination
Compile quarterly program reports
Serve as liaison to community partners for events
Maintain program archive and photo documentation

executiveBoard.name: April Stitt
responsibilities: Record and maintain minutes of all meetings
Distribute meeting agendas 7 days prior to meetings
Distribute approved minutes within 14 days of meetings
Maintain official council correspondence
Maintain attendance records
Maintain membership roster and contact database
File annual reports with state agencies
Maintain official council archives

executiveBoard.name: Gibril Kamara
responsibilities: Maintain all financial records and accounts
Receive and deposit all council funds
Disburse funds as authorized by the council
Present financial reports at each regular meeting
Prepare annual budget for council approval
Maintain records of chapter dues payments
Reconcile bank statements monthly
Prepare annual tax filings (990)
Coordinate annual financial audit
Maintain insurance policies and coverage

executiveBoard.name: To Be Appointed
responsibilities: Assist Treasurer with financial record keeping
Process membership dues and payments
Maintain financial correspondence
Prepare financial reports for meetings
Coordinate with Treasurer on budget tracking

executiveBoard.name: To Be Appointed
responsibilities: Advise on proper parliamentary procedure
Maintain current copy of Robert's Rules of Order
Review proposed amendments to bylaws
Rule on points of order when requested
Assist in resolving procedural disputes

executiveBoard.name: Dr. Viva White
responsibilities: Lead opening and closing rituals at meetings
Provide spiritual guidance to the council
Coordinate memorial services when needed
Maintain council prayer and reflection traditions
Support members during times of celebration and loss
